reviews.review: Great professor. He cares a lot about his lessons and makes the class fun.
reviews.subject: French

reviews.review: Total bore. Just does theory with no practical applications! Was totally unprepared for the AP. He's really nice though.
reviews.subject: Calculus

reviews.review: So friendly! I feel comfortable going to them for anything! Could be better at controlling the students, though.
reviews.subject: English

reviews.review: Ignore the other reviews complaining about this professor. They assign homework daily, but it's really simple and short: I do it in 5 minutes. All of the notes are uploaded online. Tests are really easy if you review them!
reviews.subject: US History

reviews.review: His class is really fun and mostly chill, but he doesn't give us nearly enough time for creating and memorizing scripts, so there are a few days of cramming each semester!
reviews.subject: Acting

reviews.review: Such a fun class with a funny teacher! He's also obviously very passionate about his subject. Those tests are impossible to prepare for, though.
reviews.subject: Science
